German[edit]

 Fahrradfahren on Wikipedia
radfahren

Alternative forms[edit]

  • radfahren

Pronunciation[edit]

  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)
  • IPA(key): /ˈʁaːtˌfaːʁən/, /ˈʁatˌfaːʁən/
  • Audio
    		(file)

Verb[edit]

Rad fahren (strong, third-person singular simple present fährt Rad, past tense fuhr Rad, past participle Rad gefahren, past subjunctive führe Rad, auxiliary haben)

  1. To cycle, to ride a bike

Usage notes[edit]

  • The spelling Rad fahren has been the prescribed spelling since the German spelling reform of 1996 (the Rechtschreibreform).
